## FluxTableColumnLike interface

FluxTableColumnLike provides metadata of a flux table column.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FluxTableColumnLike 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dataType](./influxdb-client.fluxtablecolumnlike.datatype.md) | [ColumnType](./influxdb-client.columntype.md) | The data type of column (e.g., "string", "long", "dateTime:RFC3339"). |
|  [defaultValue](./influxdb-client.fluxtablecolumnlike.defaultvalue.md) | string | Default value to be used for rows whose string value is the empty string. |
|  [group](./influxdb-client.fluxtablecolumnlike.group.md) | boolean | Boolean flag indicating if the column is a part of the table's group key. |
|  [label](./influxdb-client.fluxtablecolumnlike.label.md) | string | Label (e.g., "\_start", "\_stop", "\_time"). |
